      79                 :            :   {
      80                 :            :     /* position is assumed not to be in [x,y) */

     103                 :            :   static void swap(pointer x,pointer y)
     104                 :            :   {

     106                 :            :      * but rather their pointers. This is *not* used for implementing
     107                 :            :      * sequenced_index::swap.

     109                 :            :
